rdf:Description.Label: Select Query Rendered as a Grid
Explore an instance of a selected node type
For this master concept, what are all the keywords?
For this keyword, what is the chain of master concepts?
For this master concept, what are the direct keywords?
For this engine, what are the insights that have associated master concepts?
What are the insights for this master concept?

rdf:Description.SPARQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?Keyword ?Engine ?Perspective ?InsightLabel WHERE {BIND(<@MasterConcept-http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/MasterConcept@> AS ?MasterConcept) {?Engine <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Engine>} {?Perspective <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Perspective>} {?Insight <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Insight>} {?Keyword <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Keyword>} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Perspective> ?Perspective} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Insight> ?Insight} {?Perspective <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Perspective:Insight> ?Insight} {?Insight <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Contains/Label> ?InsightLabel} {?Keyword <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Keyword:Insight> ?Insight} {?MasterConcept <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/ConsistsOf> ?Keyword} } ORDER BY ?Keyword ?Engine ?Perspective ?InsightLabel

rdf:Description.Label: What are all the master concepts and all their keywords?
What are all the master concepts and their direct keywords only?
For this keyword, what is the direct master concept?

rdf:Description.SPARQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?Perspective ?InsightLabel ?Keyword ?MasterConcept WHERE {BIND(<@Engine-http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Engine@> AS ?Engine) {?Perspective <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Perspective>} {?Insight <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Insight>} {?Keyword <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Keyword>}{?MasterConcept <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/MasterConcept>} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Perspective> ?Perspective} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Insight> ?Insight} {?Perspective <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Perspective:Insight> ?Insight} {?Insight <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Contains/Label> ?InsightLabel} {?Keyword <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Keyword:Insight> ?Insight} {?MasterConcept <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/ConsistsOf> ?Keyword}} ORDER BY ?Perspective ?InsightLabel ?Keyword

rdf:Description.Label: What are all the insights that use this parameter?

rdf:Description.SPARQL: SELECT DISTINCT ?MasterConcept ?Engine ?Perspective ?InsightLabel WHERE {BIND(<@Keyword-http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Keyword@> AS ?Keyword){?MasterConcept <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/MasterConcept>} {?Engine <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Engine>} {?Perspective <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Perspective>} {?Insight <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Concept/Insight>} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Perspective> ?Perspective} {?Engine <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Engine:Insight> ?Insight} {?Perspective <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Perspective:Insight> ?Insight} {?Insight <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Contains/Label> ?InsightLabel} {?Insight <INSIGHT:PARAM> ?Param}{?Param <PARAM:TYPE> ?Type} {?Keyword <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/Has> ?Type} {?Keyword <http://semoss.org/ontologies/Relation/ComposedOf> ?MasterConcept}} ORDER BY ?MasterConcept ?Engine ?Perspective ?InsightLabel

rdf:Description.Label: What keywords are connected by master concept to the selected keyword?
What keywords and their nouns are connected by master concept to the selected keyword?
